Tencent is an Internet-based platform company founded in Shenzhen, China, in 1998. We use technology to enrich the lives of Internet users and assist the digital upgrade of enterprises. Our mission is "Value for Users, Tech for Good". We embrace a culture of teamwork & creativity and are driven by our values - Integrity, Proactivity, Collaboration and Creativity.
We are rapidly expanding our international operations and are looking for top talent to propel us forward. Combining the results-oriented nature of a start-up with the resources of a profitable and leading Internet company, Tencent offers a unique opportunity for aspiring individuals to thrive.

About Level Infinite
Level Infinite is a global gaming brand dedicated to delivering high-quality and engaging interactive entertainment experiences to a worldwide audience, wherever and however they choose to play. It operates from bases in Amsterdam and Singapore with staff around the world. To learn more about Level Infinite, visit www.levelinfinite.com, and follow on Twitter,Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

RecruitPostNam: Lead Technical Designer
Responsibility:
Welcome to Lightspeed LA (Irvine), the first U.S.-based, AAA game development studio for Tencent Games, where we are focused on building open-world games that emphasize an ambitious living world, sophisticated player-driven gameplay, and mature, thoughtful storytelling!

Why join Lightspeed LA (Irvine)?

Creation is the soul of our studio. For us, it’s not only about the exciting, new AAA open world game we’re developing, but also about team values and studio culture. We foster an open and transparent environment where everyone feels comfortable providing constructive feedback about all aspects of our games.We encourage the showing of work that’s still in progress
We don’t attack or question unfinished work, we celebrate its promise
We have a No Blame Culture where we blame the problem, not the person
This is a safe place to fail, and we don't view failure as a negative, but as the natural result of pushing boundaries and exploring new ideas.
We create together. We face challenges together. Most importantly, we succeed together.Responsibilities:Be the liaison between the World Design and Engineering teams
Work with multi-disciplinary teams to optimize designer workflow, processes, and content pipeline
Engage in complex technical areas such as AI, physics, animation, UI, and data management
Be the go-to person for the implementation of complex scripted content that stretches the capability of open world systems and breathes life into the ambient world
Work Location: US-Irvine

RecruitPostNam: Principal 3D Artist
Responsibility:
Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Principal 3D Artist to play a leadership role in designing a new AAA multi-platform game for gaming communities around the world.
We are a new team within TiMi who is ambitiously looking to make a massive, open world game for gamers to play for years to come. We are passionate about creating new, compelling worlds to play in and explore. Are you someone who is engaged with building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor.

Responsibilities 
Lead, mentor, and train other artists on the team to deliver AAA 3D art content in the context of new IP
Assist the Art Director and collaborate in pipeline and workflow improvements
Work closely with different stakeholders across the development team such as creative director and game director to produce 3D content in line with the game overall vision
Play a leadership role to design, create, and implement 3D content consistent with the overall vision and design of the game within technical constraints
Lead the art team in developing an active role in the evolution of the game, including large scale environment mandates including the development of concept work based on the overall design and vision of the game
Innovate, design, and produce assets through all phases of production including benchmarks, in-game blockouts, organic surfaces, hard-surface models, marketing assets, and more
Participate in knowledge sharing and mentorship initiatives 



Requirements 
At least twelve years of professional AAA game development experience, Sci-fi game experience a plus 
Prior success in leading, managing, and developing large teams of AAA gaming
The ability to effectively meet rapid deadlines on a large-scale project
Team player with the ability to take and implement constructive feedback effectively and efficiently from multiple departments
Experience creating policies and style guides for the development of AAA game teams
Prior experience creating impressive 3D art content


What is in it for you?
Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit.
Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team.
Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come. 

 
Work Location: Canada-Montreal

 -
 
Que ferez-vous ?

Vous produirez des concepts de personnages qui soutiendront notre direction créative. Vous collaborerez avec la direction artistique pour définir un style visuel unique pour notre franchise. Créer des personnages, des créatures et des concepts d'accessoires qui inspirent l'équipe et contribuent à la direction visuelle unique de notre jeu.
Travailler en partenariat avec d'autres artistes, concepteurs et ingénieurs pour fournir des solutions visuelles et conceptuelles afin d'aider à résoudre des problèmes de conception complexes.
Coordonner avec les autres responsables artistiques, la conception et la production afin d'atteindre les objectifs de l'équipe de conception artistique.

5+ years of professional experience as a Concept Artist

Strong understanding of human/creature anatomy, color theory, composition, lighting, etc

Expert understanding of Photoshop or an equivalent design program.

Ability to understand and incorporate requests and revisions effectively and efficiently

Ability to deliver art feedback with paint over, verbal and written formats

Understand gameplay mechanics and have a developer’s mindset built in, able to use your artistic skills to improve gameplay and the player experience

Create inspirational illustrations for the marketing department, generate storyboards and 2.5D frames for the narrative department

Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good.

RecruitPostNam: DevOps Engineer (Site Reliability)
Responsibility:
At the core of Tencent IEG (Interactive Entertainment Group)’s success are engineers that uphold integrity, collaborate whole heartedly, and actively seek out challenges with creative solutions. Our mission is to make Tencent games globally available for all users anywhere or anytime through reliability as a service.  

Tencent IEG’s Site Reliability Engineers leverage software engineering skills to help solve complex distributed production live services challenges by actively engaging, mentoring, orchestrating and operating global services across multiple continents and timezones. You will have the opportunity to interface games services at a global scale through multiple cloud deployments, while consistently execute with excellence and consistency. 

As the Site Reliability Engineer, the focus will primarily be on how to execute multiple games across the globe, with an emphasis on Tencent internal products and or collaborating with studios on future games that are yet to be released. 

Responsibilities:
Strong desire to eliminate toil by building tooling or automating away repetitive tasks or building cloud native solutions that will proactively mitigate problems before they arise. 

Provide subject matter expertise and on-call support for specific games and or platform services. Members on this rotation will respond to incidents that are critical to business or player issues 

Collaborate closely with fellow engineers, studios representatives while maintaining a strong working relationship based on trust, respect and empathy.

RecruitPostNam: Lead Multiplayer Designer
Responsibility:
About this position at Lightspeed LA

This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced and passionate Lead Multiplayer Designer to join our in-house team and help create world-class multiplayer experience on a new and exciting open-world AAA game. We are seeking someone who will bring passion to the role, collaborating closely with the local design leadership group and our partner studio, to help create an ambitious, unique and epic experience. Below is an outline of responsibilities and some of the qualities we look for in the ideal teammate.

Responsibilities:

Provide guidance and feedback to (a partner studio)
Lead the conceptualization and design of innovative multiplayer gameplay features and mechanics that align with the vision of the game.
Act as the primary point of contact for the remote partner team, providing guidance, feedback, and collaborating effectively to ensure the successful implementation of multiplayer systems.
Develop and maintain complex multiplayer systems including player interactions, matchmaking, progression, competitive modes, and cooperative gameplay.
Fine-tune gameplay parameters, rules, and mechanics to ensure a balanced and engaging multiplayer experience for players of varying skill levels.
Champion an exceptional multiplayer user experience by identifying potential pain points, addressing player feedback, and iterating on gameplay systems accordingly.
Team Leadership: Lead a team of multiplayer designers from our partner studio, providing mentorship, guidance, and fostering a collaborative and creative work environment.
Global Communication: Facilitate communication between teams in different time zones, ensuring that everyone has access to the information and resources they need to perform their tasks effectively. Use various communication tools to bridge geographical gaps.
Create comprehensive design documentation that communicates multiplayer mechanics, systems, and features effectively to the broader development team.
Conduct regular playtests and provide constructive feedback to improve multiplayer gameplay quality and identify areas for enhancement.

RecruitPostNam: Principal Game Designer
Responsibility:
What a Designer at Nexus Does:
Collaboration will be at your core, consistently and constructively working with a variety of teams on the design direction of their projects. You will be able to handle “difficult” conversations when titles are struggling, and ready to step in to lend a hand. 
On a practical level, you will:
· Liase daily with the Creative Director to establish strategic priorities across a portfolio of titles.
· Travel to studios to review, discuss and help guide the design of our titles.
· Ensure that the creative “Y” process is understood by all the developers and covered at each key gate during development
· Write clear and concise copy that provides leading-class insights in coherent ways. You will be able to make big ideas digestible to experts and novices alike.
· Produce frameworks for teams in need of better design documentation.
· Learn and teach; you will adapt to new processes and work with the Creative Director to ensure existing directives are met while promoting them across our teams.
· Deconstruct the strengths and weaknesses of a project incisively while making constructive recommendations for how to improve it.
· Understand the scope of a project and provide relevant insights and feedback on how it can be improved to reach our goals.
· Be able to step out of your comfort zone and assist teams under pressure to reach their goals and hit milestones and KPIs.
· Help refine the documentation of a portfolio of games to ensure it is clear and compelling in its ideas and intent.
· Collaborate with a range of developers and designers with individual needs, expectations and experience levels, often in tandem.
· Solve problems big and small on daily basis both for our projects and our internal team.
· Evaluate pre-concept builds and pen-and-paper ideation documents to spot early potential (and warnings).
· Help build the Nexus team into a high performance world class team, driving collaboration and teamwork and building a strong team culture
Work Location: US-Illinois-Remote

8.Take part in projects along with network engineering and help in supporting along with providing application plans  ；

RecruitPostNam: Project Management Assistant 101772
Responsibility:
Company Overview:
Tencent America is a leading player in the dynamic world of game publishing, based in Los Angeles, CA. We are seeking a highly motivated and organized Project Management Intern supporting to the Director and Global Project Management with a background in both business and gaming, who is proficient in Chinese and English, to join our team. This role offers the opportunity to gain valuable experience in the game publishing industry while working alongside a talented and passionate team.

Responsibilities:
Data Analysis: Utilize analytical tools to gather and interpret data related to game performance, player behavior, and market trends.
Basic Coding: Apply basic coding skills to assist in data analysis, automation of tasks, or other relevant projects.
Communication: Collaborate effectively with team members, both verbally and in writing, to convey insights and updates.
Market Research: Conduct research on the gaming industry, identifying emerging trends, competitors, and potential opportunities.
Administrative Support: Provide general administrative support to the team, including scheduling meetings, organizing documents, and maintaining records.
Translation: Act as a bridge between English and Chinese-speaking team members, assisting with translations and communication as needed.
Content Creation: Assist in the creation of marketing materials, reports, and presentations related to game publishing projects.

Qualifications:
Educational Background: Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Game Design, or a related field.
Analytical Skills: Proficiency in using data analysis tools and a basic understanding of coding languages.
Language Skills: Fluent in both Chinese and English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills in both languages.
Passion for Gaming: A strong interest in the gaming industry and an understanding of gaming culture and trends.
Adaptability: Ability to learn quickly, adapt to new tasks, and work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Detail-Oriented: Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
Location: Los Angeles, CA, or willing to relocate for the duration of the internship.

How to Apply:
If you are excited about the prospect of contributing to the success of our game publishing endeavors and meet the qualifications outlined above, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you’re the ideal candidate for this internship. We look forward to reviewing your application.
Work Location: US-Los Angeles

RecruitPostNam: Senior Data Scientist
Responsibility:
【About Tencent】
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good.
We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.

【About Level Infinite】
Level Infinite is a global gaming brand dedicated to delivering high-quality and engaging interactive entertainment experiences to a worldwide audience, wherever and however they choose to play.  It operates from bases in Amsterdam and Singapore with staff around the world. 
To learn more about Level Infinite, visit www.levelinfinite.com, and follow on Twitter,Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

【Responsibilities】
Technically lead one of the following areas (depending on your expertise): Marketing, Machine Learning Engineering, Game Science.
Collaborate closely with product and engineering teams to define and execute data strategies.
Take ownership of the product, identify growth opportunities, and develop hypotheses and data-informed strategies for growth and an enhanced user experience.
Work with large-scale datasets to solve complex business and technical problems through analytics, forecasting, machine learning, recommender system, generative AI, experimentation, causal inference, and econometrics.
Constantly learn the latest technologies in data science, effectively utilize advanced technologies and tools for application attempts, and explore innovation in applied research.
Broadly explore opportunities with an open mindset; flexibly employ various data science methods to identify high-impact opportunities, initiate project ideas, prototype solutions, and drive project completion.
Contribute to data science best practices, processes, training, and sharing; cultivate data science culture and technical advancements.
Demonstrate leadership and participate in team goal setting and planning.
Work Location: US-Palo Alto

RecruitPostNam: Operations & Development Engineer 101736
Responsibility:
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good.
We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.
About The Team
Dedicating to intelligent game marketing technology and innovative gaming solutions, the Value-added Service department provides professional support and services in elevating operational performance for numerous games, creating abundant game content and diversified entertainment experience and for Tencent game players across the globe.
The department strives to provide world-leading solutions, including game mall services - GMall, game native technology - small app engine and PIXUI, game marketing platform - AMS and Lingxi, innovative UI engine technology and many others, winning recognitions and awards from the company and the industry.
In 2022, we commit to the development of marketing capability for games, and support the successful commercialization tactics with 4000+ tailored campaigns for over 200 games, including worldwide renowned franchises like Honor of Kings, Peace Elite, PUBG mobile and many others.
At the same time, with the continuous enhancement, our system is capable in dealing with queries at the level of hundreds of billions. Together with the talents specialized in client-side, front-side, background-side, cloud native and many other fields, the department is empowered to cover comprehensive roadmap from research, design, development, operation and maintenance. 
Join us, join the Value-added Services Department! Unleash your potential, and together provide the joyful experience for Tencent players across the Global players.

Responsibilities:
• Responsible for the development and maintenance of in-game events/game applications.
• Responsible for the development of in-game marketing systems/platforms.
• Responsible for in-game system architecture design, and code review of key modules.
• Responsible for the management of Chinese and overseas technical projects.
• Responsible for the pre-research of frontier technology worldwide.
Work Location: Singapore-CapitalSpring

RecruitPostNam: Head of Content
Responsibility:
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. 

We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth.

About Level Infinite
Level Infinite is a global gaming brand dedicated to delivering high-quality and engaging interactive entertainment experiences to a worldwide audience, wherever and however they choose to play. It operates from bases in Amsterdam and Singapore with staff around the world.
To learn more about Level Infinite, visit www.levelinfinite.com, and follow on Twitter,Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
Level Infinite is seeking a Senior Communications Manager to organise and manage our worldwide content, coverage, social media and community-building/influencer efforts. We need someone who can work with multiple teams, internal stakeholders and game studios to pull together the videos, articles, podcasts, creatives, visuals and other digital content that helps us tell our Level Infinite brand story to the outside world and for our game-development studios.

You’ll need to be highly organized, creating content and social media/community schedules and plans, making assignments for various teams and events, commissioning freelancers to produce written, visual and audio content. Previous experience dealing with vendors and agencies is important. This job is best-suited to a former desk editor, social media or community head at a media or content-focused company. Deadlines will vary for each event, activity or assignment, so you’ll have to be efficient and unflappable in dealing with requests and issues related to stakeholders all over the world. Ours is a rapidly growing unit that requires you to step up, pivot deftly, punch above your weight and achieve results, regardless of circumstances. You will be expected to create or enforce structures, systems and processes and help the Head of Communications, social media, community and brand teams maintain quality standards so that the stories of our brand can be told clearly and vividly across multiple channels.

Key Responsibilities:
Organise our top-quality content services and beam our capabilities to multiple business teams, including development, publishing, branding, technology and others
Work closely with internal units and stakeholders to craft content plans for events
Collaborate with the communications team, business teams and branding team to craft and execute their content plans and help them with their longer-term strategic content-planning support for owned, earned and paid media, including but not limited to websites, press releases, game reviews, trailers, conferences etc. 
Actively identify gaps in and opportunities for our messaging and storytelling, proposing and implementing changes at both the branding and game project levels across multiple owned channels
Build and maintain a strong collaboration network with partners from agencies/production companies and vendors
Work Location: Singapore-CapitalSpring | Hong Kong

RecruitPostNam: Senior Mission Designer
Responsibility:
As a Senior Mission Designer, you will be responsible for designing and creating missions, quests, levels, and overall gameplay experiences for players. The job involves collaborating with other game development teams, such as game designers, narrative designers, artists, and programmers, to ensure that the mission design aligns with the game's overall vision and mechanics.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop mission design concepts and proposals based on the game's overall vision, story, and gameplay mechanics.
Create detailed mission outlines and documentation, including mission objectives, scripted events, and environmental elements, to provide a roadmap for the game development team.
Collaborate with game designers, narrative designers, and artists to create engaging and immersive gameplay experiences for players.
Work with programmers to ensure that implemented content functions as intended.
Playtest missions to identify and fix design flaws, bugs, and balance issues.
Iterate on mission designs based on player feedback and analytics to continuously improve the gameplay experience.
Work Location: US-California-Remote | US-Irvine

RecruitPostNam: TiMi Montreal- Animation Director
Responsibility:
Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Gameplay Animation Director to develop a AAA, 3rd person, open-world game based on an exciting IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Gameplay Animation Director, you will define the artistic direction for gameplay animation that supports our creative vision.
TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who is engaged with building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Do you strive to create captivating 3rd person combat sequences that are as fun to play as they are great to watch? Are you looking to push the boundaries of realization and immersion in video games? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor.

What will you do?

Define an artistic direction for gameplay animation that supports our overall creative vision.

Collaborate with members of the leadership team to design unique, forward thinking and achievable animation intentions that celebrate player fantasy.

Push innovations in animation technology by staying up to date with the bleeding edge of animation tech (IK, FK, motion matching, procedural rigging, etc.)

Uphold animation principles to ensure the animation direction of the game is cohesive, inspiring, and represents the right balance between good looking motion and fluid player input.

Develop a network of external partners to contribute to project deliverables.

Participate in the hiring of the animation discipline and our studio’s growth.

Identify opportunities to improve productivity, quality and collective knowledge in gameplay animation.

Direct Mocap shoots for player characters and AI characters.

-
Que ferez-vous ?
 
Définir une direction artistique pour l'animation du gameplay qui soutienne notre vision créative globale.
Collaborer avec les membres de l'équipe de direction pour concevoir des intentions d'animation uniques, avant-gardistes et réalisables qui célèbrent la fantaisie des joueurs.
Pousser les innovations dans la technologie de l'animation en restant à la pointe de la technologie (IK, FK, motion matching, rigging procédural, etc.)
Respecter les principes d'animation pour s'assurer que la direction de l'animation du jeu est cohérente, inspirante et qu'elle représente le bon équilibre entre des mouvements esthétiques et une participation fluide des joueurs.
Développer un réseau de partenaires externes pour contribuer aux livrables du projet.
Participer au recrutement de la discipline de l'animation et à la croissance de notre studio.
Identifier les opportunités d'amélioration de la productivité, de la qualité et du savoir collectif en matière d'animation de gameplay.
Diriger les prises de vue Mocap pour les personnages des joueurs et de l'IA.
Work Location: Canada-Quebec-Remote

TiMi Montréal est une nouvelle équipe de développement AAA créant un jeu de rôle innovant en monde ouvert dans Unreal Engine 5 qui fait partie du groupe primé TiMi Studio Group et Tencent. L’équipe principale du studio a une expérience éprouvée dans la réalisation de jeux à succès en monde ouvert, notamment Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry et Watch Dogs. Il s’agit d’une équipe ambitieuse qui aspire à être un studio phare pour TiMi, atteignant un public mondial de joueurs passionnés qui apprécient la culture optimiste et inclusive du studio qui récompense le développement de jeux de rupture et de prise de risque.
Responsabilités :
Le groupe primé TiMi Studio Group est à la recherche d’un animateur technique principal pour le développement d’un jeu en monde ouvert AAA basé sur une nouvelle propriété intellectuelle. Le projet sera diffusé sur plusieurs plateformes en utilisant la dernière technologie d’Unreal. En tant qu’animateur technique principal, votre rôle sera de développer des pipelines de création de contenu et des fonctionnalités qui soutiennent notre direction d’animation.
TiMi Montréal est un nouveau studio au sein de TiMi Studio Group, une filiale de Tencent Games. Nous sommes passionnés par la création de mondes attrayants que les joueurs pourront explorer pendant de nombreuses années. Cherchez-vous à repousser les limites de ce que les jeux peuvent réaliser visuellement? Êtes-vous passionné par la combinaison de l’art et de la technologie? Alors, rejoignez-nous dans notre ambitieux projet.
Quel sera votre rôle?
L’animateur technique principal travaille en collaboration avec le directeur de l’animation, le directeur de l’animation technique et les programmeurs pour définir et créer les pipelines nécessaires à la production de contenu d’animation de haute qualité. Ils offrent des conseils et un soutien à une équipe d’animateurs, en identifiant les améliorations technologiques qui maximisent la qualité, la performance et l’efficacité. Ils sont à l’aise de travailler dans un environnement hautement collaboratif et novateur.
Développez un pipeline de production de contenu d’animation évolutif et des outils qui soutiennent notre vision créative.
Configurez et soyez le propriétaire de la fonctionnalité des graphiques d’animation de jouabilité.
Établissez des règles et des lignes directrices pour la production de contenu d’animation.
Produisez des références visuelles qui font avancer la technologie et maximisent la qualité.
Collaborez avec l’équipe de programmation pour guider le développement des fonctionnalités, agir comme un pont entre les programmeurs de jouabilité et les animateurs.
Soutenez une équipe d’animateurs pour créer du contenu de manière efficace et cohérente.
Définissez des budgets de performance pour des composants spécifiques du jeu.
Profilez et optimisez les performances sur console/PC.
Rédigez et gérez la documentation technique.
Développez des plans de test robustes en collaboration avec l’équipe d’assurance qualité.
Quel profil cherchons-nous?
Au moins six ans d’expérience professionnelle en développement de jeux AAA. 
Au moins deux titres AAA en monde ouvert produits dans la génération actuelle de consoles.
Forte maîtrise technique des outils et de la technologie de développement de jeux.
Maîtrise de Motion Builder, Maya et 3DS Max.
Excellente compréhension de la production, de l’intégration et de la validation de contenu d’animation.
Joueur d’équipe, hautement collaboratif et axé sur les résultats.
Bonnes compétences en communication et en présentation.
Autonome et proactif pour développer des solutions hautement efficaces.
Curieux d’apprendre et de mettre en œuvre de nouvelles technologies basées sur les tendances du secteur.
Une expérience de développement et d’extension avec Unreal Engine 4 est un plus. 
Qu’est-ce que ça vous rapporte?
Développez des jeux qui améliorent la qualité de divertissement pour un public mondial et font une impression sur l’ensemble du secteur. Rejoignez un studio avec une équipe ambitieuse, talentueuse et expérimentée travaillant dans un environnement optimiste et inclusif. Créez de nouveaux mondes à explorer, expérimenter et apprécier en rejoignant une équipe qui s’intéresse à l’innovation et qui et veut ravir les joueurs avec une nouvelle conception de jeu créative pour des expériences en monde ouvert. Aidez à créer le prochain grand monde de jeu dans lequel les joueurs pourront s’immerger pendant des décennies. 

Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Technical Animator to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Senior Technical Animator, your role will be to develop content creation pipelines and features that support our animation direction.
TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you looking to push the boundaries of what games can achieve visually? Are you passionate about the combination of art and technology? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor.

What will you do?

The Senior Technical Animator works in collaboration with the Animation Director, Technical Animation Director and Programmers to define and create the pipelines needed to produce high quality animation content. They offer guidelines and support for a team of animators, identifying technological improvements that maximize quality, performance and efficiency. They are comfortable working in a highly collaborative and innovative environment.

Develop scalable animation content production pipeline and tools that support our creative vision

Set up and be the feature owner of gameplay animation graphs

Establish rules and guidelines for animation content production

Produce visual benchmarks that push technology forward and maximize quality

Collaborate with programming team to guide feature development, act as a bridge between Gameplay Programmers and Animators

Support a team of animators to build content efficiently and consistently

Define performance budgets for specific components of the game

Profile and optimize performance on console/PC

Write and maintain technical documentation

Develop robust test plans in collaboration with QA team

What we’re looking for?
At least six years of professional AAA game development experience 

At least two AAA open world titles shipped in the current generation of consoles

Strong technical proficiency with game development tools and technology

Mastery of Motion Builder, Maya and 3DS Max

Excellent understanding of animation content production, integration and validation

Team player, highly collaborative and results oriented

Good communication and presentation skills

Autonomous and proactive to develop highly efficient solutions

Curious about learning and implementing new technologies based on industry trends

Experience developing in and extending Unreal Engine 4 a plus 


What is in it for you?
Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit.
Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team.
Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come. 
Work Location: Canada-Quebec-Remote

RecruitPostNam: Senior User Researcher
Responsibility:
Overview
Tencent is creating a new User Research lab in central London, and we are seeking an experienced user researcher to get us started. This is an exciting opportunity to help build a games user research lab and function from the ground up and working with a range of studios and titles. You will play a key role informing how the user research should be conducted and setting the culture for how the team should operate.
Joining Tencent Games, you will be part of a dynamic and growing company that plays a crucial aspect in delivery towards Tencent’s ‘Tech-for-Good’ focused strategy. You will work alongside award winning studios, making some of the most popular games in the world; your mission is to work with these studios and support them with research-informed insights about player behaviour and experience during the development lifecycle and beyond.
If you are passionate about delivering unparalleled consumer experiences and pushing the boundaries of entertainment, we invite you to join our mission and help us deliver the next generation of cutting-edge games and witness your work improving the experience of millions of users!

What You Will Be Doing
Work directly with key studios to understand their research needs and establish a research strategy.
Scope, plan and execute end-to-end research projects and ensure your findings are impactful to the title and studio.
Establish and improve the quality of our lab, services and processes
Set the research quality bar and culture for the UR lab and team – ‘This is how we operate’.
Mentor more junior researchers as they join the team.
Be an ambassador for user research and the benefits it delivers during game development.
Work Location: UK-London

RecruitPostNam: Senior Product Manager (Financial Risk Control & Security)
Responsibility:
Position Overview
With our strong business growth globally, we are now looking for Product Manager (Financial Risk Control) to join our fast growing Tencent Cloud business in Singapore. He/she will own the product curation, design, and management cycle and commercialise our financial risk control security products in banking and fintech industries across Southeast-Asia.

Product Overview
The Risk Control Platform (RCP) is a one-stop intelligent risk control solution based on Tencent's intelligent risk control technology and anti-fraud capabilities, combined with successful financial service infrastructure output experience. It helps clients establish a smart risk control system platform necessary for their business. The platform provides real-time and centralized intelligent risk management services. By integrating modules such as data collection, data cleansing, feature processing, rule models, and top-level scenarios, it forms an end-to-end service platform that aligns with real-world risk control scenarios. 

Responsible for curating and structuring financial risk control products and solutions suited for Southeast-Asian B2B financial markets.
Keep abreast on the evolving ecosystem of financial risk control and fintech industries in Southeast Asia. Continuous familiarity with the business processes of financial institutions locally and regionally.
Propose innovative solutions that meet local market demands. Drive internal and external discussions and implement the most effective solutions.
Plan mid-to-long term direction of international product lines to push for iterative development and achieve internationally recognised standards.
Work Location: Singapore-WeWork

RecruitPostNam: Senior Researcher
Responsibility:
【About Tencent】
Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. 

We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. 【About IEG】
Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG) is responsible for the R&D, operation, and development of the company's interactive entertainment business including games and eSports. Through online gaming, live broadcasts, and offline eSports, IEG assists the company in leading the global interactive entertainment market to create better interactive entertainment content experiences for users. 


Job Summary:
We are seeking a full-time employed senior researcher with passion and a solid background in 3D Reconstruction, including but not limited to explicit and implicit 3D representation, single-view or multi-view reconstruction, text-to-3D, and etc. We aim to apply cutting edge techniques to Tencent Games; you will have an opportunity to witness your work improving experience of millions of users! 

In this role you are expected to have deep understanding of 3D reconstruction algorithms, such as Nerf, Neus, PIFU, Magic3D and etc. You will partner with Games Digital Content Technology Center to guide the future of Tencent’s interactive entertainment technologies.
Responsibilities:
You will conduct independent research and development of mainstream algorithms and emerging technologies of 3D reconstruction for future products.

RecruitPostNam: Senior Pre-sales Architect (Financial Risk Control & Security)
Responsibility:
Position Overview
With our strong business growth globally, we are now looking for Cloud Security Architect (Financial Risk Control) to join our fast growing Tencent Cloud business in Singapore. He/she will own the pre-sales cycle and commercialise our financial risk control security products in the banking and fintech industries across Southeast-Asia.

Product Overview
The Risk Control Platform (RCP) is a one-stop intelligent risk control solution based on Tencent's intelligent risk control technology and anti-fraud capabilities, combined with successful financial service infrastructure output experience. It helps clients establish a smart risk control system platform necessary for their business. The platform provides real-time and centralized intelligent risk management services. By integrating modules such as data collection, data cleansing, feature processing, rule models, and top-level scenarios, it forms an end-to-end service platform that aligns with real-world risk control scenarios. 
 
Strong familiarity with financial risk control and anti-fraud security products, with experience in B2B pre-sales cycle. Capable of designing and expanding the B2B products for commercial purposes.

RecruitPostNam: Senior IT Project Manager
Responsibility:
Position Overview:
Technology Engineering Group (TEG) is responsible for supporting the company and its business groups on technology and operational platforms, as well as the construction and operation of R&D management and data centers, TEG provides users with a full range of customer services. As the operator of the largest networking, devices, and data center in Asia,TEG also leads the Tencent Technology Committee in strengthening infrastructure R&D through internal and distributed open source collaboration, constructing new platforms and supporting business innovation. 
Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future-ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal/external customers and becoming a world-class global IT team are our top aspirations.
We are currently seeking a passionate Sr. IT Project Manager, Reporting to Tencent’s Europe IT Center, this position will be based in Amsterdam, Netherlands, responsible for IT projects like IT products, platforms, applications, infrastructure, and process optimization projects.


Primary Responsibilities
Cooperate with overseas IT global teams and local operations teams to provide the best IT and cloud infrastructure solutions for Tencent's Europe business.
Act as domain expert in both IT and business, IT project manager who focusing on client relationship management, is responsible for building and establishing positive relationship between Tencent oversea IT and its internal/external business clients such as Tencent Europe Game Studios and other business departments.
In-depth understanding of Tencent Europe ‘s internal/external business clients, continuous communication of clients’s IT needs, able to collect & identify business clients’ pain points, problems and potential demands, then transform them to IT-language requirements, ensure the orderly management of IT requirements.
IT Solution adoption: promote existing IT solutions to business based on need/value. Represents service feedback from the business to IT.
As a member of Tencent Europe IT team, organize business demands review and IT requirement review meeting, write high quality business requirements review reports and other IT requirements documents.
According to the company's business development, manage and optimize IT projects, pay attention to delivery efficiency and operating costs, and be responsible for business satisfaction and delivery quality.
Work with project sponsors to identify project scope, define success criteria, build and manage project budget, and outline resource requirements.
Break down plans into digestible parts and lead team throughout the lifecycle of the demand including go-live support.
Effectively communicate with relevant, x-functional stakeholders (business and IT in both HQ and Overseas) regularly to manage expectations and to provide product and project updates on scope, budget, velocity and key performance metrics.
Engage project steering committee for guidance and key decisions.
Provide simple, to the point, quality stat using consistently to different audience including executives.
Identify and manage risks, issues, action items and decisions.
Foster relationships and collaborate with cross functional teams and different org levels including but not limited to business stakeholders, design teams & engineering teams
Continuously improve IT product and infrastructure management processes, and enhance Speed to Market, such as but not limited to, process optimization, automation, self-service, and supportability.
Define and deliver quantitative and qualitative data driven analytics/metrics to drive and measure product capabilities adoption, customer satisfaction and continuous improvements.
Work Location: Netherlands-Amsterdam

RecruitPostNam: Senior 3D Reconstruction Researcher 101118
